song.title: Indigo
song.info:
(c) basehead / fm 1996
inspired by the music of yennek, 3mb, eddie fowlkes and juan atkins. a tribute to the detroit sound....
samples from: roland jv800, the orb, maelcum, chuck biscuits, stalker, jogeir liljedahl, c.c.catch, dizzy, vinnie, octoque
n-joi
(btw-- as far as i know, this tune only sounds correct in Impulse Tracker version 2.02, so if you play it with some other player, i don't guarantee it's correct.)
